articles.title: Postpartum care: Experts tips on nutrition and fitness for new moms - The Indian Express
articles.description: Postpartum care for new moms should prioritize nutrition and fitness alongside baby care. Experts recommend focusing on high-calcium and high-protein foods to support breast milk production, including legumes, nuts, and seeds. It's crucial not to discontinue …
articles.content: Focus on including high-calcium and high-protein foods to support breast milk production. Include legumes, lentils, nuts, seeds, whole grains for plant-based proteins.
